text:
Kris Jenner and her daughters share a funny conversation in front of the momager's scribe.

On Sunday's "Keeping Up With the Kardashian" episode, Jenner brought her personal scribe when she met her daughters Kim, Kourtney and Khloe Kardashian. She introduced her scribe, Madhvi, to the trio who were all surprised about their mom's move.

"Wait, when you're having a conversation, does Madhvi also record what I'm saying or just what you're saying?" Kourtney asks in the clip (via E! News).

"What everybody's saying," Kris answers back. "I mean, it's kind of amazing. I can look back and tell you exactly what I said. There's no doubt."

Khloe admits that she finds having a scribe kind of strange. So, the "Revenge Body" star asks her mom, "Do you really want everything documented?"

When Kourtney excuses herself to use the bathroom, Khloe starts to have some fun. She tries to embarrass her mom and make her feel awkward in front of her scribe.

"Mom, do you have to pee or are you good with your diaper?" Khloe asks Jenner. "She queefed in our workout the other day. She was queefing!" she adds.

"I did not!" the momager says as she laughs with Khloe and Kim.

That's not all, Khloe made up a story on how Jenner ill-treated her when she was a child. "All you do was get drunk. It's wild. Please call child services, you have no idea what I go through on a nightly basis," she adds.

"Don't punish me because somebody's writing everything down. It's not funny anymore!" Jenner pleads to Khloe.

Khole and Jenner have a great mother-daughter relationship. In fact, Jenner considers their relationship, mother-daughter goals. So, what Khloe says is clearly just for fun knowing that someone is recording their conversation.

Earlier this month, the momager turned 62 and celebrated her birthday with her children. After her birthday bash, Jenner took to Instagram to thank Khloe and her boyfriend, Tristan Thompson.

"At the end of the day, they really do love me!!!!! Thank you @khloekardashian and @realtristan13 for loving me in your own special and precious way!!!" Jenner wrote. "I love you so so much my bunny and amazing Tristan!!! #koko #obsessed #motherdaughtergoals #blessed #perfectcouple #family."

What can you say about Khloe's statement to make Jenner feel embarrassed in front of her scribe? Drop a comment below?
title: Khloe Kardashian Embarrasses Mom Kris Jenner In Front Of Scribe [WATCH]
